name: UnLed
description:
Lana and Steph, young archeologists, were exploring an abandoned temple, before disaster struck, and Steph was infected by an ancient virus. 
To save her loved one, Lana must bring Steph all the way into the bowels of the temple in search of a cure.

As Lana, you are 'leashed' to zombie Steph, and despite her good nature she wants nothing more than to eat her brains.

Creatively use the situation you find yourself in to solve puzzles, avoid traps and progress through the temple to find the cure!

Developed by Evelyn Schwab and Eli Taylor

Artwork by Jasper Coady
